text:
="preserve">Jean Bonhomme (8 June 1924 – 16 October 2020) was a French politician. He was Mayor of Caussade from 1959 to 1989. He was a member of the French National Assembly from 1968 to 1981 and again from 1986 to 1988. He was born in Puylaroque, France.
Bonhomme died on 16 October 2020 in Caussade at the age of 96.
